message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $87.50. It's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $85 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're sticking to your original offer of $85. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $86. It's a good price considering the value it brings, and I think you'll be happy with it.
